lines.name: Tadhana
lines.text: Haven't you heard the rumor?

lines.name: Tadhana
lines.text: If you climb all the way up the mountain, the Stars will grant you a single wish.

lines.name: Akio
lines.text: ... A bird? I would prefer that you keep your distance from me.

lines.name: Akio
lines.text: Please stay away from me. I'm allergic.

lines.name: Akio
lines.text: Will this make you leave me alone?

lines.name: Andras
lines.text: Hellu little one~ How are your joints feeling?

lines.name: Andras
lines.text: I wonder if Amaius is out fishing...

lines.name: Ava
lines.text: Sorry. Busy.

lines.name: Ava
lines.text: ...Not much of a talker.

lines.name: Ava
lines.text: A bit shit today, huh?

lines.name: Ava
lines.text: Hoping I can get more done before dark.

lines.name: Ava
lines.text: Working hard?

lines.name: Ava
lines.text: Hey. Seen Deko around? Tall, teal hair, lots of energy? Came here with him. Lost him.

lines.name: Ava
lines.text: Think I need to spend more time down here...

lines.name: Ava
lines.text: Might need this more than me.

lines.name: Ava
lines.text: ...What? As long as I don't stay 'til 2am, I'm good.

lines.name: Ava
lines.text: Hm? Need something?

lines.name: Ava
lines.text: You're [[name]], yeah? How's the climb?

lines.name: Ava
lines.text: Oh, it's you again.

lines.name: Ava
lines.text: Climbing today? If you see Wander up there, give this to him?

lines.name: Ava
lines.text: Is Sou looking for me? I'll be back in a sec, just went to grab something from the house.

lines.name: Cameron
lines.text: (He takes a picture of you with the valley behind you while you weren't looking.)

lines.name: Cameron
lines.text: ... 'It's peaceful up here. But it can be tiring to get to, make sure you take it easy.`

lines.name: Cameron
lines.text: ... (He seems to be in his own thoughts as he looks at the scenery.)

lines.name: Celsi
lines.text: Oh, good day.

lines.name: Celsi
lines.text: Are you going out exploring? Best of luck.

lines.name: Celsi
lines.text: I'm not especially adventurous, but the Peak sounds interesting.

lines.name: Celsi
lines.text: Would it be rude of me to ask about your explorations?

lines.name: Celsi
lines.text: ...Oh, I'm sorry. I was watching the glowbugs.

lines.name: Celsi
lines.text: Be sure to keep safe on your adventures.

lines.name: Celsi
lines.text: I found this earlier. I hope it will help with your climb.

lines.name: Cyrille
lines.text: I took some herbs from the garden. Don't tell Erebuni!

lines.name: Cyrille
lines.text: Would you love me if I were a worm?

lines.name: Cyrille
lines.text: Call me Cuffie!

lines.name: Cyrille
lines.text: Hi!

lines.name: Cyrille
lines.text: Boogerwash.

lines.name: Cyrille
lines.text: Keep an eye out for shooting stars tonight!

lines.name: Cyrille
lines.text: Hehehehehehehehe

lines.name: Cyrille
lines.text: Have you heard about the story of the pond frog? Well, it goes like this‚Äî

lines.name: Cyrille
lines.text: Have you seen my cheese wheel?

lines.name: Cyrille
lines.text: I'II give you a puffball mushroom if you start a fire in the next one secon‚Äî too late!

lines.name: Cyrille
lines.text: (You are given a vial of something that smells quite potent. The label on it reads: Assense.)

lines.name: Cyrille
lines.text: Ahaha! How dull~

lines.name: Cyrille
lines.text: I made a tiny coffin for a bee I found.

lines.name: Cyrille
lines.text: The success rate of getting to the top of a tree is dependent on...

lines.name: Cyrille
lines.text: By the laws of possession of people with possessions no longer in possession, you might become possessed if you don't find what you're looking for!

lines.name: Cyrille
lines.text: You get a gold star for trying.

lines.name: Cyrille
lines.text: WATCH OUT!!!

lines.name: Cyrus
lines.text: AWOOOOOOOOOOOOOO!! ...when did you show up.

lines.name: Cyrus
lines.text: Don't you just wanna scream?

lines.name: Cyrus
lines.text: Duuuuuuudddeeee... you gotta try this.

lines.name: Cyrus
lines.text: Do you ever feel like a paper bag? Drifitng through the wind?

lines.name: Cyrus
lines.text: Find anything good? Here, I don't want this.

lines.name: Cyrus
lines.text: I live here. I'm kidding... or am I?

lines.name: Cyrus
lines.text: (He appears to be fiddling with something on the ground.)

lines.name: Cyrus
lines.text: What am I doing...? None of your business.

lines.name: Cyrus
lines.text: (A tin can is blown by the wind and hits the side of his head.)

lines.name: Cyrus
lines.text: Ow, what the fuck...

lines.name: Cyrus
lines.text: Have you climbed the water tower?

lines.name: Cyrus
lines.text: ...Actually, don't, that's my hangout spot.

lines.name: Cyrus
lines.text: Well. I guess I don't own it.

lines.name: Cyrus
lines.text: Do whatever you want.

lines.name: Cyrus
lines.text: How's the water get up there...?

lines.name: Cyrus
lines.text: It's a conspiracy.

lines.name: Cyrus
lines.text: (He appears lost in thought.) ...Huh?

lines.name: Cyrus
lines.text: Oh. Was just thinking.

lines.name: Cyrus
lines.text: What the fuck do you want?

lines.name: Deko
lines.text: If I were you I'd go say hi to the two cuties over there!

lines.name: Deko
lines.text: Yeah, I'm talking about the statues! They must get lonely here even though they have each other! It's only good manners to greet them!

lines.name: Deko
lines.text: Hey, I found this but I just restocked, so I don't need it! Hopefully it'll bring some good vibes! Can't be bad, it's locally sourced!

lines.name: Deko
lines.text: Any chance you've come across somebody called Ava while in here? I think we got separated...

lines.name: Deko
lines.text: This is why you use the buddy system, I'm telling you!

lines.name: Deko
lines.text: UWAAHH!!

lines.name: Deko
lines.text: O-Oh, oh it's just you. Stars, you gave me a fright!

lines.name: Deko
lines.text: Hey hey! Just so you know, the door is never locked if you need shelter from the rain!

lines.name: Deko
lines.text: Don't mind the suspicious looking miniature mountain outside, he's a nice guy, really! Rarely moves!

lines.name: Deko
lines.text: Here, this should help with the climb! But you better ask somebody more experienced about the logistics of climbing a mountain!

lines.name: Dinadan
lines.text: Oh hey, little buddy! You didn't get lost, did you?

lines.name: Dinadan
lines.text: Who's the cat on my shoulder? Oh! It's my cousin's cat, Kamisa! She has a gift for you.

lines.name: Dinadan
lines.text: Living here on the mountain side reminds me of my home, Dagian. Have you heard of it by chance?

lines.name: Dinadan
lines.text: I'm not the only one from Dagian actually. I live here with a few of my friends!

lines.name: Florian
lines.text: If you're looking for Pistachio, it's over that way. The view is nice, if you can stand the cold.

lines.name: Florian
lines.text: Hey, be careful when you exit the caves. You don't want to slip or anything.

lines.name: Florian
lines.text: Hm? Did you need something?

lines.name: Florian
lines.text: On days like this, the view really takes your breath away.

lines.name: Goldie
lines.text: What's up, buttercup?

lines.name: Goldie
lines.text: How's the climb going? Stay safe out there.

lines.name: Goldie
lines.text: Hail! Intrepid adventurer! It's dangerous out there- have this!

lines.name: Goldie
lines.text: Have you seen Zane? I hope that guy's taking breaks.

lines.name: Goldie
lines.text: Beautiful day, isn't it? I could go for some volleyball  right about now.

lines.name: Goldie
lines.text: Groooss, rain. I hope this clears up soon, it's no fun like this.

lines.name: Hiraya
lines.text: Oh! Hello! Are you having a good day?

lines.name: Hiraya
lines.text: Be careful out there! It's a big valley!

lines.name: Hiraya
lines.text: Have you ate yet? Here, have some!

lines.name: Hiraya
lines.text: You're egg-cellent!

lines.name: Irene
lines.text: Nice view, isn't it?

lines.name: Irene
lines.text: Hello, there. Oh, me? I'm just watching my owl from afar.

lines.name: Irene
lines.text: You remind me of my friend's quingee, Bippy. Except Bippy is tinier and always has a blank stare.

lines.name: Irene
lines.text: You'd be surprised by the amount of inspiration that can be found here.

lines.name: Irene
lines.text: Another day of running errands...

lines.name: Legretta
lines.text: You know I own a restaurant? It's called El Encanto, it's in Butternut Home, you should come by sometime!

lines.name: Marcelo
lines.text: Scram.

lines.name: Marcelo
lines.text: I don't have food for you.

lines.name: Marcelo
lines.text: Shoo.

lines.name: Marcelo
lines.text: You caught me in a good mood. Take this.

lines.name: Paxis
lines.text: Oh, hey. Wanna keep me and my friend here company?

lines.name: Paxis
lines.text: ... Oh. Hi. Sorry, I was just thinking...

lines.name: Paxis
lines.text: Oh, hello! Have we met before?

lines.name: Paxis
lines.text: Ah! You startled me, little buddy.

lines.name: Paxis
lines.text: Hey, little buddy. Wanna hear a song?

lines.name: Paxis
lines.text: You've been busy, huh? Here. I'm trying some new things too.

lines.name: Paxis
lines.text: Let me know if you like it!

lines.name: Quyen
lines.text: Hey, you! Stay still for a moment. Let me draw you!

lines.name: Quyen
lines.text: Well aren't you adventurous? Have this for good luck!

lines.name: Quyen
lines.text: Whoah! You look like you're in a hurry.

lines.name: Quyen
lines.text: I'm curious, do you know how to read? You should come to the library.

lines.name: Rosendo
lines.text: Hm? Watch where you're going, you're going to get hurt.

lines.name: Rosendo
lines.text: Taking shelter, huh? Well, stay as long as you need.

lines.name: Rosendo
lines.text: You're awfully in a hurry‚Ä¶

lines.name: Rosendo
lines.text: Did you need something? A fish? Yeah, you can have one of mine.

lines.name: Sou
lines.text: The flowers around here are pretty... Here, you should have one.

lines.name: Sou
lines.text: Have you seen Ava around? I wonder where she wandered off to...

lines.name: Sou
lines.text: Could you say hi to Bullfrog for me? I hear he's been hard at work.

lines.name: Sou
lines.text: I could stand in the rain forever... Do you like the rain?

lines.name: Sou
lines.text: Oh, hey there little guy! You're so cute...

lines.name: Sou
lines.text: Ah, I almost didn't see you there- are you okay?

lines.name: Tadhana
lines.text: You've ‚òùÔ∏è  just üìâ  been üò§  GUPPIED!!! ü§™ ‚ö†Ô∏è pass üå¨Ô∏è this ü§æ‚Äç‚ôÄÔ∏è guppy ü¶ê to üòö TEN üö† other üì≤ GUPSTERS üö∑ to üß≠ avoid üö© the üí≠ GUPPY üêü CURSE‚ò†Ô∏è

lines.name: Tadhana
lines.text: You're destined for greatness, little one.

lines.name: Tadhana
lines.text: But you already knew that, didn't you?

lines.name: Tadhana
lines.text: Have you been to the Trading Post yet? We sell everything there!

lines.name: Tadhana
lines.text: Can you hold onto this for me for a moment?

lines.name: Tadhana
lines.text: Have you met Sun Eater? I think you two would get along well.

lines.name: Tadhana
lines.text: Hey-- if you're holding onto a lot of stuff you don't think you'll use, you can sell them at the Trading Post!

lines.name: Tadhana
lines.text: Did you know I can see the future? I know yours!

lines.name: Tadhana
lines.text: Take this. It's important. Don't lose it.

lines.name: Tadhana
lines.text: Hehe. Wanna help me play a prank?

lines.name: Tadhana
lines.text: Piper said it's going to storm today. Haha! Would you believe it? She was right!

lines.name: Tadhana
lines.text: You'll need this. Trust me.

lines.name: Tadhana
lines.text: SCRAAAAAAAAAAA!

lines.name: Tadhana
lines.text: Hm? Making an attempt at fulfilling your destiny today?

lines.name: Tadhana
lines.text: Do you think you'll find what you're looking for there?

lines.name: Tadhana
lines.text: At the end of your journey, will you finally be satisfied?

lines.name: Tadhana
lines.text: Do you believe in the Stars, [[name]]?

lines.name: Tadhana
lines.text: I'm visiting Oz today. I think they'd love to meet you-- do you like flusters?

lines.name: Tadhana
lines.text: Did you know Piper climbs the mountain like every week?

lines.name: Tadhana
lines.text: What's she doing there? Controlling the weather, duh!

lines.name: Tadhana
lines.text: Fate is often easier to deal with when one is not alone.

lines.name: Tadhana
lines.text: But sometimes, it is one's fate to be alone.

lines.name: Tadhana
lines.text: Keep at it, Fated One. Eventually, the answers will be yours to take.

lines.name: Toki
lines.text: Quibby! Wait, you're not- my bad. What's up?

lines.name: Wynne
lines.text: Oh, me? I'm looking for Quingfoot!

lines.name: Wynne
lines.text: What do you think is on that island at the middle of the lake? Maybe buried treasure!

lines.name: Wynne
lines.text: Hey there! Do you think it'll be a nice night for star-gazing? Here, make a chart with me when you get the chance!

lines.name: Wynne
lines.text: This is the best spot to see the whole valley if you don't wanna go all the way to Pistachio.

lines.name: Wynne
lines.text: Did ya find anything cool today? Here!

lines.name: Wynne
lines.text: Have you been climbing up to the Peak? Honestly, it makes me a little nervous, haha!

lines.name: Wynne
lines.text: Nice to meet'ya, [[name]]! I'm Wynne Dee, hehe!

lines.name: Wynne
lines.text: Heya! Do you need a hand? I used to get lost here all the time!

lines.name: Wynne
lines.text: Have you seen the Wishing Well, yet? It's pretty neat!

lines.name: Wynne
lines.text: Good to see you again!

lines.name: Wynne
lines.text: I hope the explorin' has been going good!

lines.name: Yuliya
lines.text: We always need a friend, here have one!
